name: The Adventures of Fluffy
description:
Fluffy is a little blue Evo creature that lives on an island of Kekusan. His ancestors had descended on the island many centuries ago, but now the Kekusan empire sees them as pests! and wants to eradicate the whole Evo population.

Features
-8 themed levels with 2 sub-levels and 1 boss in each level.
-Collectable coins
-Potion/Weapons/Clothes shop
-Perks
